https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vauRWAX6rwLoBW9tx8pPaw2MFbC.jpg It is the Spring of 1943 and the Battle for the Atlantic rages as an Axis victory seems inevitable. The women of Vic Mu – Gladys, Lorna, Kate, Betty and Vera – band together in a tight bond of support and friendship. Bomb Girls: Facing the Enemy
